00009     bool PrimaryGeneratorMessenger::useRootSeed_{false};
00010 
00011     PrimaryGeneratorMessenger::PrimaryGeneratorMessenger(PrimaryGeneratorAction* thePrimaryGeneratorAction) :
00012             primaryGeneratorAction_(thePrimaryGeneratorAction) {
00013 
00014         // lhe commands
00015         lheDir_ = new G4UIdirectory("/ldmx/generators/lhe/");
00016         lheDir_->SetGuidance("Commands for LHE event generation");
00017 
00018         lheOpenCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/generators/lhe/open", this);
00019         G4UIparameter* lhefilename = new G4UIparameter("filename", 's', true);
00020         lheOpenCmd_->SetParameter(lhefilename);
00021         lheOpenCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00022 
00023         // root commands
00024         rootDir_ = new G4UIdirectory("/ldmx/generators/root/");
00025         rootDir_->SetGuidance("Commands for ROOT event generation");
00026 
00027         rootOpenCmd_ = new G4UIcommand("/ldmx/generators/root/open", this);
00028         G4UIparameter* rootfilename = new G4UIparameter("filename", 's', true);
00029         rootOpenCmd_->SetParameter(rootfilename);
00030         rootOpenCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00031 
00032         rootUseSeedCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit, G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00033     }
00034 
00035     PrimaryGeneratorMessenger::~PrimaryGeneratorMessenger() {;}
00036 
00037     void PrimaryGeneratorMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command, G4String newValues) {
00038         if (command == lheOpenCmd_) {
00039             primaryGeneratorAction_->setPrimaryGenerator(new LHEPrimaryGenerator(new LHEReader(newValues)));
00040         }
00041         if (command == rootOpenCmd_) {
00042             primaryGeneratorAction_->setPrimaryGenerator(new RootPrimaryGenerator(newValues));
00043         }
00044         if (command == rootUseSeedCmd_) {
00045             useRootSeed_ = true;
00046         }
00047     }
00048
